UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship of indolicidin, a Trp-rich antibacterial peptide.
Literature.Author: Ando S, Mitsuyasu K, Soeda Y, Hidaka M, Ito Y, Matsubara K, Shindo M, Uchida Y, Aoyagi H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis IFO 3513(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus IFO 12732(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Escherichia coli IFO 12734(MIC=50.0µg/ml)
